mapper.sql: no, naked_vision_left, naked_vision_right, corrected_vision_left, corrected_vision_right, degree_left, degree_right, color_vision, other, physician_opinion
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from eye_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into eye_info (no, naked_vision_left, naked_vision_right, corrected_vision_left, corrected_vision_right, degree_left, degree_right, color_vision, other, physician_opinion) values (#{no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nakedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, #{nakedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{correctedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, #{correctedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{degreeLeft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{degreeRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicianOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into eye_info
no,
naked_vision_left,
naked_vision_right,
corrected_vision_left,
corrected_vision_right,
degree_left,
degree_right,
color_vision,
other,
physician_opinion,

mapper.update:
update eye_info
no = #{record.no,jdbcType=INTEGER},
naked_vision_left = #{record.nakedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL},
naked_vision_right = #{record.nakedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL},
corrected_vision_left = #{record.correctedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL},
corrected_vision_right = #{record.correctedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL},
degree_left = #{record.degreeLeft,jdbcType=INTEGER},
degree_right = #{record.degreeRight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color_vision = #{record.colorVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other = #{record.other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
physician_opinion = #{record.physicianOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update eye_info set no = #{record.no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, naked_vision_left = #{record.nakedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, naked_vision_right = #{record.nakedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, corrected_vision_left = #{record.correctedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, corrected_vision_right = #{record.correctedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, degree_left = #{record.degreeLeft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, degree_right = #{record.degreeRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_vision = #{record.colorVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other = #{record.other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, physician_opinion = #{record.physicianOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update eye_info
naked_vision_left = #{nakedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL},
naked_vision_right = #{nakedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL},
corrected_vision_left = #{correctedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL},
corrected_vision_right = #{correctedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL},
degree_left = #{degreeLeft,jdbcType=INTEGER},
degree_right = #{degreeRight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color_vision = #{colorVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
physician_opinion = #{physicianOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update eye_info set naked_vision_left = #{nakedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, naked_vision_right = #{nakedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, corrected_vision_left = #{correctedVisionLeft,jdbcType=REAL}, corrected_vision_right = #{correctedVisionRight,jdbcType=REAL}, degree_left = #{degreeLeft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, degree_right = #{degreeRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_vision = #{colorVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, physician_opinion = #{physicianOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=INTEGER}
